articles.summary: StockStory: Reflecting On Surgical Equipment & Consumables - Specialty Stocks’ Q3 Earnings: LeMaitre (NASDAQ:LMAT). The end of the earnings season is always a good time to take a step back and see who shined (and who not so much). Let’s take a look at how surgical equipment & consumables - specialty stocks fared in Q3, starting with LeMaitre (NASDAQ:LMAT). Related tickers mentioned: LMAT.
